data.title: Umicore Ceramics
data.meta_description: Company information of Umicore, Kyocera and Ogussa group, detailed figures and company values. Our mission and our vision are focus on innovation in sustainability
data.text:
A global materials technology and recycling group.

A group of innovation and sustainability with more than 200 years’ history, based in Belgium.

11,565 employees based in 38 countries, and revenues of €4.2 billion by 2022.

Umicore loves innovation.

Dedication to clean technologies – emission control catalysts, materials for rechargeable batteries and recycling.

Ambition and mission: Materials for a better life.

Founded in Germany, KYOCERA Fineceramics Solutions GmbH offers innovative solutions for industries.

From Deutsche Steinzeug to Friedrichsfeld GmbH later FRIATEC AG and finally becoming KYOCERA Fineceramics Solutions GmbH, the company has a history of more than 150 years.

Technologies for ceramic components for laboratory, electrical and medical engineering.

A local and global market leader.

Part of the worldwide KYOCERA Corporation, headquartered in Japan, one of the world's leading manufacturers of fine ceramic components for the technology industry.

Our mission

Umicore generates the majority of its revenues and dedicates most of its R&D efforts to clean technologies, such as emission control catalysts, materials for rechargeable batteries and recycling.

Umicore’s overriding goal of sustainable value creation is based on an ambition to develop, produce and recycle materials in a way that fulfils its mission: Materials for a better life.

Our vision

Innovation: Umicore's R&D efforts involve more than 900 colleagues in 20 research and technical centres worldwide, focusing on key global challenges like clean mobility and resource scarcity. Each year Umicore invests some €150 million in these initiatives.

Discover more about our Innovation Awards.

Sustainability: Our main contribution to a more sustainable world centers around the products and services we provide. The areas where we can make the most telling contributions are: resource scarcity, clean air, vehicle electrification and clean energy.

Discover more
